revised_title: Magnetisation of Iron and Other Magnetic Metals in Strong Fields
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to examine the magnetic behavior of iron and other magnetic metals when subjected to strong magnetic forces. They used a method called the "isthmus" method of magnetization and found that the magnetic force within the metal was continuous with the force outside. The results showed a progressive decrease in the outside field as the induction rose, suggesting that the intensity of magnetization may pass a maximum and decrease under the action of very strong fields.
